byline.original: By JIM RUTENBERG and JEFF ZELENY

abstract: Republican debate in Las Vegas is marked by raised voices and personal attacks as primary campaign moves into more aggressive phase two months before first votes are cast; many such attacks are directed against Mitt Romney.
snippet: In the most contentious of the debates so far, Mitt Romney came under attack from the other Republican presidential candidates, signaling the start of a tough new phase of the campaign.
lead_paragraph: In the most contentious of the debates so far, Mitt Romney came under attack from the other Republican presidential candidates, signaling the start of a tough new phase of the campaign.

headline.main: A Fierce Clash for Romney and Perry as Republican Candidates Debate
headline.print_headline: A Fierce Clash for Romney and Perry as Republican Candidates Debate
headline.seo: Republican Presidential Candidates Debate in Las Vegas
